docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times: "Herod in our Homes" is not a myth. Our sanitary officers all receive their commissions from his majesty King Herod, and hold them on the conditions that the slaughter of children and fools shall never fall below...
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: "Herod in our Homes" is not a myth. Our sanitary officers all receive their commissions from his majesty King Herod, and hold them on the conditions that the slaughter of children and fools shall never fall below a certain standard, which has been for the past seven years annually one cut of every twenty seven of the good, easy going people of this City.

docs.snippet: The steamship Bavaria, Capt. TAUBE, from Southampton, Aug. 18, arrived here yesterday. From later London papers thus received, we obtain various additional details of news; with the able speech of Mr. COBDEN upon meeting his constituency at Rochfort,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Bavaria, Capt. TAUBE, from Southampton, Aug. 18, arrived here yesterday. From later London papers thus received, we obtain various additional details of news; with the able speech of Mr. COBDEN upon meeting his constituency at Rochfort, and a graphic picture of the military fete at Paris, from our own correspondent.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the schooner Star at NewOriearn, we have advices from Vera Cruz to Aug. 14three days later. The news is of trifling significance. Political matters remain tranquil, Nothing, in fact, has transpired in the past month worthy of note....

headline.main: NEWS FROM MEXICO.; Mails by the Schooner Star--The State of Parties--A Constitutional Revolt at Jalapa--The Decrees of Expropriation--Movements of Minister McLane, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the schooner Star at NewOriearn, we have advices from Vera Cruz to Aug. 14three days later. The news is of trifling significance. Political matters remain tranquil, Nothing, in fact, has transpired in the past month worthy of note. The Constitutional Party here are awaiting, in anxious suspense, news from Senior LERDO DR THJADA and his mission to the United States.
